resources.string:
"
Hi everyone,
 First of all, thanks for having the time to check out my app!
 I am Suhas. Just a regular computer science engineering student from Bangalore.
 So, this is my first app. I didn't have any background in Java nor XML when i developed this app.
 You could say I developed this app out of nowhere. But yeah, the Internet was very helpful(as always, sigh).
 To outline the details of this app: 
 1) Opens Facebook. 
2) Opens Instagram.
 3) Opens WhatsApp!.
 So click the button and have fun!"
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
